title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: I believe will saw the new shift of many altcoins price that made the green light to remain stable in some days to make some altcoins hodlers to make a new decision to apply for potential altcoins that will make their profits surplus when the real bull run show up in the market soon. I guess Ethereum and Binance are very good in long hodling because, since I became regular in the crypto market, I discovered that this two altcoins carry huge population to stand in second and third position in the market that is giving me hope that they are good in long term hodling and, it will be difficult for their customers to experience negative results like what other customers are experiencing from new altcoins in the market. Do you think this two altcoins are good in long hodling in this season? Because I have seen some reason that made me to apply for long term in this little shift of the price of altcoins which the bull run will show up fully next week.

comments.body: Majority of the altcoin that are on the top 50 of the coinmarketcap are good for long hold.  Most of them are in the market for many years.  Aside from that, any new promising project are also good for long hold.  If we can find a good project with huge potential, it can possibly give us a life-changing profit if we happen to be one of the pioneer of that promising project.That said, I think Tron is still good for long hodling together with EOS and possibly CRO.  ADA should also be included on the list IMO.  The developer of these projects are keep on working together with their marketing team to promote and increase the number of their market supporters.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: ETH and BNB are two of the largest names in the altcoin market but I don't think BNB is equally safe with ETH. ETH is much better and safer than BNB. BNB is like FTX in one way or another because it is highly dependent on its platform. It is Binance's native coin. Although it has since grown widely, it still cannot detach itself completely from Binance the exchange. Whatever happens to that exchange, the price of BNB will definitely be affected. Binance is facing investigations and legal cases. If the exchange crushed, BNB will immediately follow.
